items.title: Inflation outlook tumbles to pre-tariff levels in latest University of Michigan survey
items.description: Consumers' worst fears about tariff-induced inflation have receded, though they are still wary of price increases to come.

items.title: Israel's stock market outperforms Middle East counterparts despite multi-front wars
items.description: Israel's markets have been lifted by significant foreign investment and more recently by renewed investor confidence following its 12-day conflict wit...

items.title: Kevin Warsh touts 'regime change' at Fed and calls for partnership with Treasury
items.description: Warsh called for sweeping changes on how the Fed conducts business and suggested a policy alliance with the Treasury Department.

items.title: Trump denies that he plans to fire Powell: 'Highly unlikely'
items.description: The comments came after the Supreme Court indicated that President Donald Trump does not have the authority to arbitrarily fire Fed Chair Jerome Powel...

items.title: Wholesale inflation measure was unchanged in June
items.description: The producer price index for June was expected to increase 0.2%, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.
